name: Moses
description: Greatest prophet, led Israel from Egypt. Received the Torah at Sinai, spoke with God face to face. Staff-wielder, lawgiver, reluctant hero.

parting-sea.name: Parting the Red Sea
parting-sea.description: Staff raised, waters dividing before him
parting-sea.prompt: standing with staff raised high - waters of the sea dividing into massive walls on either side, robes and beard blowing in wind, face showing divine authority, the moment of greatest miracle

burning-bush.name: At the Burning Bush
burning-bush.description: Kneeling before the bush that burns but isn't consumed
burning-bush.prompt: kneeling or standing reverently before burning bush - sandals removed, face showing awe and reverence, hand perhaps shielding eyes, the moment of divine calling

confronting-pharaoh.name: Confronting Pharaoh
confronting-pharaoh.prompt: standing boldly before throne - staff in hand, pointing or gesturing commandingly, 'Let my people go' on his lips, the shepherd who became prophet confronting the most powerful king
confronting-pharaoh.energy: prophetic boldness, speaking truth to power

tablets-raised.name: Holding the Tablets
tablets-raised.description: Descending Sinai with the tablets of the Law
tablets-raised.prompt: descending mountain carrying two stone tablets - face perhaps glowing, tablets showing Hebrew text, bringing the covenant to the people, the weight of divine law

striking-rock.name: Striking the Rock
striking-rock.description: Staff striking rock for water in the wilderness
striking-rock.prompt: striking rock with staff - water gushing forth, face showing mix of frustration and power, the miracle that cost him the Promised Land, provision with consequences

overlooking-promised-land.name: Viewing the Promised Land
overlooking-promised-land.description: On Mount Nebo, seeing the land he cannot enter
overlooking-promised-land.prompt: standing on mountaintop gazing at distant land - elderly but strong, staff in hand, seeing the fulfillment of the journey he cannot complete, satisfied yet longing
